widget.name: DropdownDivConverter
widget.description: The DropdownDivConverter converts a Mendix (div-)container into a - Bootstrap based - dropdown menu with a button. Simply create a container in Mendix with all the content you want in the dropdown menu and the DropdownDivConverter widget as it's last child. Everything you will have added then becomes the content of the dropdown menu.

property.caption: Dropdown button label
property.description: The label on the dropdown button. Note, can be overridden on the Data Source tab

property.caption: Glyphicon icon
property.description: Add a Bootstrap glyphicon icon to the button by entering the glyphicon classname (e.g. 'glyphicon-user'). If left empty, no icon will be created.

property.caption: Drop up
property.description: Use a drop up menu instead of a dropdown menu

property.caption: Right aligned menu
property.description: Align the menu to the right for right-hand side usage of the view

property.caption: Start open
property.description: Will the menu be open on load?

property.caption: Menu self-close
property.description: If set to true: clicking on the menu or it's buttons will close the dropdown menu.

property.caption: Button size
property.description: The size of the dropdown button

property.caption: Button type
property.description: The (bootstrap-) type of the dropdown button

property.caption: Context object
property.description: The entity required for the microflow or dynamic label

property.caption: Dynamic button label
property.description: The attribute that sets the label on the dropdown button. If used, the static value on the general tab will be overridden.

property.caption: Split button dropdown
property.description: Create a split button dropdown which has an extra button with microflow. Note: the label for the dropdown will be used for this button.

property.caption: Simple Microflow
property.description: A simple microflow without a needed entity which is triggered if the main split button is clicked.

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: A entity driven microflow which is triggered if the main split button is clicked. Note that the Context Object from the Data Source tab is required.
